1.SceneDescription: Central Perk, the whole gang minus Monica is there.

lines.Line:
Do you think that there’s a town in Missouri or some place called
Sample? And ah, as you’re driving into town there’s-there’s like a sign,
and it says “You’re in Sample.” (He says it like urine sample.
You’re not gonna believe this. Okay, so I go over..

lines.Character: [Two guys walk over and interrupt her. They’re both names you’ve already heard. One’s Billy Crystal. Yes, that Billy Crystal from City Slickers. The other one is Robin Williams. Yes, that Robin Williams from Mrs. Doubtfire
lines.Line: Two guys walk over and interrupt her. They’re both names you’ve already heard. One’s Billy Crystal. Yes, that Billy Crystal from City Slickers. The other one is Robin Williams. Yes, that Robin Williams from Mrs. Doubtfire.

I’m sorry. Ex-excuse us. I’m sorry, it’s a little
crowded. Do you mind if we... (motions to the couch
Yeah, move over just a little bit.

lines.Character: (Rachel, Chandler, Phoebe, and Joey all scooch over to let them sit down
lines.Line: Rachel, Chandler, Phoebe, and Joey all scooch over to let them sit down.

lines.Character: [cut to Monica telling the gang about what happened at Pete’
lines.Line: cut to Monica telling the gang about what happened at Pete’s
So guys, listen, I go over there, and umm..

lines.Character: (Robin interrupts her again by complaining loudly to Billy as the camera cuts to them
lines.Line: Robin interrupts her again by complaining loudly to Billy as the camera cuts to them.
Why? Why?! What’s wrong with me?
Why? Why?! What’s wrong with me?
I have a feelin’... I, my wife is sleeping with her gynaecologist

lines.Character: (The gang is now eaves dropping in on the conversation, and is shocked
lines.Line: The gang is now eaves dropping in on the conversation, and is shocked.
Y'know it’s that feeling you get, y'know

Like when you go bowling and you know you’re in somebody else’s
shoes
All right, so, so you went to Pete’s..

Why is this happening to me?! I don’t know, maybe it’s my
wound
Forget it. (they all turn and listen to Billy and Robin

No-no, it’s ooozing, oozing. (to Rachel) Could you pass me the
cream? Is there any—Oh, there’s the cream

Thomas, this is gonna be hard, but I wanted it to come from me, and
nobody else
It’s me, I’ve been sleeping with your wife

(to Joey) Hey, I’m trying to have a private conversation! Is that
okay?

(starting to cry) Ooh, (to Rachel) Can I have a napkin, please? Could you
please hand me a napkin? (Rachel tries to grab one, but is to slow for his tastes.) Would
you--Give me this thing (grabs the napkin holder from her.) all right!! Enough! (to Billy)
And you are no longer my friend! We are finished! (gets up to leave) Nada!! No more! You
are a bastard for doing this!! (Billy follows him) Get away from me!
Thomas, come back here! (they both leave
Thomas, come back here! (they both leave

lines.Character: [cut to the gang, they’re all stunne
lines.Line: cut to the gang, they’re all stunned

lines.Character: [cut to the gang, they’re all stunne
lines.Line: cut to the gang, they’re all stunned
So Monica, what were you gonna tell us

2.SceneDescription: Chandler’s office, he is just finishing a meeting with his boss.

lines.Line:
So thanks for the warm welcome. It’s good to have you guys on my
team, and I come to play. I hope you do too. Now, let’s go out there and get
‘em! Huh? And remember, there is no ‘I’ in team

Yes, but there’s two in martini, soo everybody back to my
office
(to Chandler) You! Chuckles! What’s your name
(to Chandler) You! Chuckles! What’s your name
Oh it’s Bing, sir. I’m sorry , I was just ah..

No-no, I heard what you said, funny. I like funny. (Chandler starts to
leave) This team is about hard work, but it’s also about having fun. Good to have you
aboard Bing! (smacks him on the butt, and Chandler leaves shocked.

3.SceneDescription:
A Gym, Pete is training for the Ultimate Fighting Championship, with his
trainer, Hoshi.

lines.Line:
You are iron. You are steel! Let me ask you something, how come when I
call your computer support line, I have to wait an hour and a half

I told you, we’re adding new operators all the time. Could we
concentrate on my training
It’s just hard when I know I have e-mail I can’t get!
Monica! (runs over and kisses her) Hi honey
All right, on the table. (Pete gets on the table for his rubdown

Hey, umm, so listen umm, my friends were telling me a little about this
ah, ultimate fighting thing and it, well it sounds really dangerous. I-I don’t want
you to get hurt, ‘cause I kinda like you

Oh, believe me, I don’t want to get hurt either. I’m being smart
about this. See these guys? They’re the best trainers in the world, and Hoshi here
used to be a paid assassin. (Hoshi yells at him in Chinese) A house painter! He used to be
a house painter
Hey, are we still on for tonight

Okay, good, ‘cause umm, well maybe we could have a little workout
of our own..
No! No boom-boom before big fight
No! No boom-boom before big fight

4.SceneDescription:
Chandler’s office, Chandler is bent over getting some water as his boss
approaches.

lines.Line:
Bing! (Chandler stands bolt upright and turns around to face him.) Read
your Computech proposal, a real homerun. (He goes to slap his butt, but Chandler slides
over making him miss.) Ooh. Barely got ya that time, get over here. Come on. (Chandler
goes over) Wham! (slaps him on the butt) Good one. That was a good one. (to a couple of
Chandler’s co-workers) Keep at it team. (goes into his office
(to his co-workers) What is with him
With him? You’re is favourite, you’re his guy
Well, that’s not true, he-he smacked you once
Not on purpose, he ricocheted of you and got me

I’m telling you, I need some smacks. I got a kid starting
Dartmouth in the fall

(coming out of his office) Dartmouth? Who went to Dartmouth? Dartmouth
sucks. Did you go to Dartmouth Bing
There you go. (smacks him on the butt

5.SceneDescription: The Arena, after the fight. Monica is walking up to a defeated Pete.

lines.Line:
Hey! (she sits down next to him) It’s me. Mon-i-ca! Can I just tell
you how proud I am of you
It would be nice after hearing 20,000 people chant “You suck!

I mean I-I thought you were nuts at first, but you-you did it. And now
you can just look back at this thing with no regrets
Well, you’re not gonna get going are you
Well let me ask you a question. Am I the Ultimate Fighting Champion

Well I’m not gonna stop until I’m the Ultimate Fighting
Champion
That guy stood on your neck until you passed out

Let me tell you a story. When I set out to create Moss 865, do you think
it just happened overnight? No. There was Moss 1, that burnt down my Dad’s garage,
there was Moss 2 that would only schedule appointments in January, and 862 others that I
learned from, just like I learned from this fight, never to let a guy stand on my neck
Look, I’m gonna get better. Okay? I promise you
Okay, just get a lot better. (pause) Fast
Okay, just get a lot better. (pause) Fast

Oh, one other thing. Hoshi thinks that you being ringside may have
affected my concentration

6.SceneDescription:
Chandler’s office, Chandler is confronting his boss about the butt
smacking thing. His boss is writing on a white board.

lines.Line: Excuse me, Doug? (no reaction) Hey there sports fan!
(turning around) Bing! You got those numbers for me
No, I ah, I didn’t do them
No, I ah, I didn’t do them

No, no I just ah, didn’t do them. Instead, I ah, hung out with a
couple of friends and had a couple of beers so I certainly don’t deserve any praise,
verbal or otherwise

Well, I got tanked myself last night. Pretty dicey drive home, Tapanzi
Bridge never looked smaller. (laughs) That’s okay, you’re still my number one
guy! (slaps him on the butt) Bing

I’m a little bit uncomfortable with the that way you express
yourself

Oh, is it the swearing? I mean is it the constant swearing? Because I
gotta tell ya, if it is, you can just... kiss my ass

No, no. It-it’s not about the swearing, it’s more about ah,
the way, that you ah, occasionally, concentrate, your enthusiasm on my buttock

Oh, and don’t get me wrong, I appreciate the sentiment. It’s
just that I, I have a rather, sensitive posterior, and ah, besides, it’s making all
the other guys jealous

Well, say no more. Y'know it takes guts to bring this up. Bing!
You’re okay

Ha! (goes to smack him on the butt, but stops, faking Chandler out)
Ahhhhhhh
Ahhhhh! (walks out, imitating shooting himself in the head

7.SceneDescription:
A locker room, Pete is in a full upper-body cast. Monica enters, sees him, and
gasps. Pete tries to turn around, and winces in pain.

lines.Line:
It’s okay, it’s not as bad as it looks, it’s a precaution.
Ah, I’m not supposed to move my spine
Please tell me you’re stopping now

I’m fine! I’d fight tonight, if they’d let me. (stands up
and starts swinging his arms) See this circle I’m marking off here? This is my zone
of terror
You are insane! You-you gotta give this up
You are insane! You-you gotta give this up

I can’t until I’m the ultimate fighter. I will do it. I’m
telling you, the day will come when children will argue over who will win a fight, me or
Superman. Now, I’m not saying I could beat Superman, but y'know, kids are stupid

Sit down. All right? Please, just listen to me. You are terrible at
this! Okay? You are the worst ultimate fighter ever! Ever!!

Y'know I have a torn rotator cuff, a hairline fracture in my right
forearm, and a severely bruised Adam’s Apple, but that really hurt

Well then, y'know what? I care about you to much to watch you hurt
yourself like this. So if you have to do this, then you’re gonna have to do it
without me

Well if you’re asking me to quit, then you’re asking me to be
someone I’m not. I’ve got to do this

Well if you’re asking me to quit, then you’re asking me to be
someone I’m not. I’ve got to do this
Then I’ve gotta go. Bye. (kisses him and starts to walk out

Could you leave a note? ‘Cause I’m on a lot of pain killers now,
and I don’t know if I’ll remember this tomorrow. (She leaves.

8.SceneDescription:
Monica and Rachel's, the gang is watching Pete fight on TV. Monica is hiding in
the kitchen, not watching.

lines.Line:
Pete Becker is circling the ring now. It looks like, he’s
just trying to feel him out. Oh, Bruiser is just..
Run! Run you crazy, rich freak
Oh, I can’t watch this. (turns her eyes away
Check it out, he’s winning! (to Monica) Pete’s winning
Check it out, he’s winning! (to Monica) Pete’s winning

Uh-oh, Bruiser has Becker on the canvas and is going for his
favourite area
Oh! Oh! (they all recoil in horror
Oh! Oh! (they all recoil in horror
Wait, if that’s his favourite area, why is he being so mean to it

Well, this is ironic. Of your last two boyfriends, Richard didn’t
want to have kids, and from the looks of it, now Pete can’t
Ohh!! (they all start pointing at the screen
Ohh!! (they all start pointing at the screen
